stringMap.registeredmark: Tetakent brand (Arch that's pointing north-west and 'Tetakent' text) is registered mark of H.C.G in Turkiye Republic.

stringMap.sure-remove-question: Are you sure to remove that question? If section has no questions, also section will be removed
stringMap.creator: Creator
stringMap.name: Name
stringMap.creator-license-agreement: I agree to the terms of ownership of the Lotus question book. I have all permissions and rights to the questions included in this book.
stringMap.adding: Book is getting added, please wait

stringMap.slogan-2: New generation studying and problem solving application

stringMap.page-not-found: The page you were looking for was not found
stringMap.page-not-found-desc: The page you were looking for could not be found. The reason for the error may be that you entered the wrong page address or the address of the page you are trying to reach has changed. If you do not think the error is yours, please send us a feedback.
stringMap.suspended: Unfortunately, because one or more actions were taken on this account that do not comply with the community rules, we have suspended your account for a period of time due to '{reason}'. If you think this is in error, please contact us at info[at]tetakent[dot]com.
stringMap.error-while-save: An error has been occured while save
stringMap.need-to-login-to-show-page: You need to log in to view this page.
stringMap.account-activated: Welcome back. Your account has been activated and you can log in.

stringMap.email-format: Please enter a valid email address.
stringMap.username-regex: Username must start with a letter, followed by alphanumerics, periods and underscores only. Lower case only
stringMap.localeCode: Locale code (That will be used in e-mails and other comminications)
stringMap.name: Name
stringMap.PasswordLowerLetter: At least 1 lowercase letter is required
stringMap.PasswordUpperLetter: At least 1 uppercase letter is required
stringMap.PasswordMinChars: This field must be at least {length} long
stringMap.PasswordNumbers: This field must contain at least 1 number
stringMap.PasswordSpecialChars: This field must contain at least 1 punctuation character
stringMap.PasswordCommons: For your security, commonly used words such as 'password', 'admin' and consecutive numbers such as '1234...' should not be used in this field.
stringMap.Samety: This field is not same with related field

stringMap.fail-authentication: User is not found or password does not match

stringMap.need-admin: To use the central, you must log in as an admin. You can log in using the button on the top right.
stringMap.first: 'Kyle Broflovski' is the admin user added for initial startup. You can find the login information from the console logs at first startup. If you can't see, clean the users document in the ubsusers database on MongoDB (after a backup) and then, run UBS Users. Then upload your backup

stringMap.archive-long: Archive mode is similar to off, comment entry is closed but comments can still be viewed.
stringMap.userCommentBlockReason.disabled: Unable to comment in this section
stringMap.unblock-question: Do you now allow users to comment in this area?
stringMap.block-question: Are you sure you want to block the user to comment in this area?

stringMap.welcome: Welcome to the new generation question solving platform. Find the book you want from the homepage, add it to your library and start studying
stringMap.try-urself-long: You can try yourself from any question book, and at the end of the trial, you can review your correct answers, incorrect answers and timing.
stringMap.we-love-green-long: No, we are not talking about an illegal plant or money! We are talking about nature. Thanks to Lotus, publishing houses are reducing their printing and shipping costs, energy consumption and carbon footprint.
stringMap.platforms: On any phones, any computers or any tablets
stringMap.no-download: No downloads, no installation. The keys to success are right in your hands.

stringMap.benefit-start: By logging in, you can add this book to your library and also access these features for free.
stringMap.start-trial: Start a trial on any book
stringMap.show-your-trials: Show your recent trials on book being studied
stringMap.login-instant-add: If you log in, this book will be added to your library instantly

stringMap.bu-kitap-bir-takm-tarafndan-yn: This book is managed by a team.
